heading: HR00359
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GAMES AND AMUSEMENT TO ENSURE THAT THE BIDDING FOR THE PHILIPPINE LOTTERY SYSTEM (PLS) OF THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH LAWS AND BEST PRACTICES IN ORDER TO PROMOTE THE PRUDENT USE OF PUBLIC FUNDS AND THE BEST INTERESTS OF THE FILIPINO POOR
status: Pending with the Committee on GAMES AND AMUSEMENTS since 2019-09-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00359
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GAMES AND AMUSEMENT TO ENSURE THAT THE BIDDING FOR THE PHILIPPINE LOTTERY SYSTEM (PLS) OF THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH LAWS AND BEST PRACTICES IN ORDER TO PROMOTE THE PRUDENT USE OF PUBLIC FUNDS AND THE BEST INTERESTS OF THE FILIPINO POOR
